title: Welcome to the Cooperstone Lab Ohio Apples page!
text:
The goal of this website is to share data collected at The Ohio State University on the traits of Ohio apples valuable to local growers.
Select ‘About’ at the top to learn more, or ‘Apples’ and choose an apple to learn more about.

title: Sweet Maia
text:
An early-season MAIA apple with fall qualities.






 Ripe apple flavor with honey and earthy notes, with a hint of grassiness.





Relative size

title: Scruffy
text:
A stripey, mid-season MAIA apple.






Apple flavor with grassy notes.

title: Rosalee
text:
A mid-season Honeycrisp x Fuji cross from MAIA.






Apple flavor with grassy notes.





Relative size

title: Plum Delicious
text:
A late season apple.






Apple flavor with earthy, ripe apple notes and hints of honey, grassiness, and fruitiness.

title: MDW 20-100
text:
A mid-season apple






Apple flavor with floral, grassy, and honey notes.

title: Kindercrisp

A Minnesota apple that ripens in late August.






Apple flavor with apple notes and hints of honey and earthiness.

title: Golden Russet

A late season apple.






Grassy flavor with apple notes and hints of earthiness and honey.

title: About
text:
This project is sponsored by the Ohio Department of Agriculture (ODA) and the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) and supported by the Midwest Apple Foundation (MAF).
The Ohio State University research team: Dr. Jessica Cooperstone, Dr. Diane Miller, Dr. Jonathan Fresnedo-Ramirez, Dr. Chris Simons, and hard-working graduate students (Lydia Balogh, MSc., and others).
After extensive food sensory testing on 32 apple selections, the purpose of this website is to publicly share the results of the taste, flavor, and texture attributes found for these selections. The attributes of these apples may be used to educate both growers and consumers about Ohio apples.
For more information about the food sensory tests, please select ‘Descriptive Analysis’ or ‘Consumer Testing’ in the drop-down menu under ‘About.’

A late-season Eckert Swiss apple.






Apple, grassy flavor.

title: Crimson Crisp

title: Ludacrisp

title: Sansa
text:
An early season apple.






Ripe apple flavor with honey, grassy notes and hints of earthiness and fruitiness.

title: Summerset
text:
An MAIA apple ready for picking early September.

title: Zestar
text:
